title: Firmware & Sensors Manager, Home and Audio Devices
summary: The team is looking for a skilled and motivated Firmware Manager that will be able to lead development of sensing based experiences for Home and Audio products of the future. The ideal candidate will have broad knowledge in a number of sensing devices and technologies to coincide with firmware capabilities necessary to make the sensor become an experience. Apply today!
description: Genuine passion for innovation and product development with experience from inception through delivery to customers. The Firmware Manager will be individually responsible for all things firmware and sensing related. Architect, design, develop, and maintain hardware and firmware for Apple home and audio products. The individual will be also responsible for the overall sensor integration in the product and insuring the highest quality execution to launch amazing new product features.
key_qualifications: 7+ years of firmware development in bare-metal or RTOS environments ideally in consumer electronics. 2+ years of sensing system hardware engineering experience such as optical, IMU, capacitive, environmental, light, motion, radar, acoustic, etc. 2+ years management experience in fw/sw engineering. Experience building and mentoring strong firmware platform teams. Experience driving large or complex projects throughout full product and sw development lifecycle; including defining goals and ensuring milestone delivery. Able to succeed in collaborative cross-functional environment across many teams and across organization. Influence and negotiate effectively at all levels of management. Strong, demonstrable coding skills in C/C++ in production environments. Clear understanding of customer experience and impact, respective use cases and expected performance. Availability to travel domestically and internationally for development and on-site manufacturing support is also expected.
education_experience: M.S. in EE, CE, CS, or equivalent industry experience
